articles.description: X (formerly Twitter) has turned on audio and video calls for everyone. Find out which settings you need to tweak to avoid interruptions and unwanted calls.
articles.content:
Change your settings to avoid unwanted calls on X (formerly Twitter)
getty
Earlier this week, X (formerly Twitter) announced that audio and video calls are now available to everyone on the service.… [+2829 chars]
